<?php
// Simple trigger script
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, "http://digiturk.ilekasoft.com/bayi_hakedis_tanimla.php");
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo "Page triggered, check debug.log\n";
?>
